params.allowlistProof: The proof of the claimer's inclusion in the merkle root allowlist                                        of the claim conditions that apply.
params.currency: The currency in which to pay for the claim.
params.data: Arbitrary bytes data that can be leveraged in the implementation of this interface.
params.pricePerToken: The price per token to pay for the claim.
params.quantity: The quantity of NFTs to claim.
params.receiver: The receiver of the NFTs to claim.

params.resetClaimEligibility: Whether to reset `limitLastClaimTimestamp` and `limitMerkleProofClaim` values when setting new                                  claim conditions.

claim(address,uint256,address,uint256,(b.notice: Lets an account claim a given quantity of NFTs.

setClaimConditions((uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Lets a contract admin (account with `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE`) set claim conditions.
